attributes.action: Find David Davis in Contempt of Parliament due to Impact Assessment Debacle.
attributes.additional_details: Either David Davis has provided false information to Parliament or he has failed in due diligence in regards to the most important and impactful change to the UK economy in a generation.
attributes.background: On 25th October David Davis confirmed to the EU Select Committee that impact assessments had been created covering 50-60 areas of the UK economy and the impact that leaving the EU would have on them. He has now stated that these do not exist.
